description:
Business Type:
Milk Delivery Startup

Description:
A farm-to-home milk delivery service providing fresh milk every morning through
subscription-based plans with quality assurance.

Target Audience:
Urban households, apartments

Tone:
Modern, clean, trustworthy

Design Notes:
- App-style layout
- Subscription plans section
- Strong CTA: “Start Daily Delivery”

pages.name: home
pages.purpose: To introduce the milk delivery service, showcase its benefits, and convert visitors into subscribers.

pages.name: about
pages.purpose: To build trust by sharing the company's story, mission, and commitment to fresh, quality milk.

pages.name: contact
pages.purpose: To provide a clear way for customers and potential customers to get help or ask questions.

styling.design_style: minimalist, app-style layout with clear, bold typography
